summary.span: 命名空间包含定义区域性相关信息的类，这些信息包括语言，国家/地区，正在使用的日历，日期、货币和数字的格式模式，以及字符串的排序顺序。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that define culture-related information, including language, country/region, calendars in use, format patterns for dates, currency, and numbers, and sort order for strings.

summary.span: 这些类对于编写全球化（国际化）应用程序很有用。

span.span: These classes are useful for writing globalized (internationalized) applications.

summary.span: 而像 和 这样的类更是为我们提供了诸如代理项支持和文本元素处理等高级全球化功能。

span.span: Classes such as and provide advanced globalization functionalities, including surrogate support and text element processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下 MSDN 博客包含命名空间及其类的讨论：The following MSDN blogs include discussions of the namespace and its classes: - [http://blogs.msdn.com/shawnste/](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160948) - [http://blogs.msdn.com/kierans/](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160951) 请注意，此命名空间中的两个类型（和）都位于名为 sysglobl 的程序集中。Note that two of the types in this namespace, and , are found in an assembly named sysglobl.dll. 如果成功编译使用这些类型的代码，则需要添加对 sysglobl 的引用。Successfully compiling code that uses these types requires that you add a reference to sysglobl.dll.
